Steps.Description: Trick
If opponent uses Close Combat
and you get a Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
and player doesn't get a Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Flamethrower, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
if opponent switches into Garchomp, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Night Slash, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
If opponent switches out into Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
If opponent switches into Garchomp, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + 2x X.Speed then sweep
g: If opponent switches out into Hariyama, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into  Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
h: If opponent sswitches out into Magnezone, use Earthquake
If opponent sends Cacturne, switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower. switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados) then sweep
If opponent sends out Claydol, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum. (Use Ice Punch after using X.Speed vs. Gyarados) then sweep
If opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep
i: If opponent switches into Salamence, Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick
If opponent switches out into Hariyama, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep (Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama)
If opponent stays, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower;
If opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep
Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum

If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch. It will send in Excadrill, so switch into Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into your own Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak then sweep
Trick
If you get an Air Balloon, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Focus Sash, switch into your own Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep

If opponent switches out into Magnezone, use Earthquake
If opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent sends out Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed then use Ice Punch. Then use Belly Drum and sweep then sweep
If opponent has Intimidate, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent has Moxie, use Thunder Punch
If opponent sends out Darmanitan, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent sends out Electivire, switch into Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol Close Combat. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed. then sweep (Shadow Ball vs. Toxicroak)
If opponent sends out Excadrill, switch into your own Excadrill then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent sends out Garchomp, switch into Excadrill then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill Stealth Rock into Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent stays, Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. then sweep. Use Shadow Ball vs. Hariyama

If opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep

If opponent switches into Excadrill, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep

If opponent has an Air Balloon, let Metagross die then send in Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent doesn’t have Air Balloon, send in Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep

Trick
If you get an Expert Belt, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Life Orb, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Meganium, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Then switch into Poliwrath as Lucario comes out
If opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

and opponent uses Earthquake, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep (Use Iron Head vs. Froslass)
and opponent uses Will-o-Wisp, use Stealth Rock
, If opponent switches out into Houndoom, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill Honchkrow. Switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
, If opponent switches out into Hydreigon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
If opponent switches into the real Dusknoir, switch into Blissey and use Trick then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Hydreigon
If you get a Choice Scarf, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
If you get a Focus Sash, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure
If opponent uses Fire Blast, switch into Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Then switch into Poliwrath X.Defend into Belly Drum then X.Speed then sweep

If opponent switches into Lucario, switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. It will send out Chandelure, so switch into Blissey to force her to switch into Hydreigon and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
Trick then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep (Use X.Defend before you use Belly Drum vs. Hydreigon)
Switch into Chandelure then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
Switch into Blissey and use Trick
If opponent switches into Lucario, switch into Poliwrath;
If opponent uses Crunch, Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Extreme Speed, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Honchkrow, switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower. Hydreigon is sent out, so switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
Trick
If players Metagross is faster, switch into Blissey and use Stealth Rock
If opponent switches into Lucario, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent switches into Mawile, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Blissey and use Trick. Then switch into Poliwrath X.Defend into Belly Drum then X.Speed then sweep

Metagross is slower, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill Honchkrow. Out comes Hydreigon, so switch into Poliwrath X.SpDef (If Hydreigon used Dark Pulse) + X.Speed + Belly Drum then sweep
Trick
If opponent uses Aura Sphere
and you get a Focus Sash, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Out comes Hydreigon, so switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed then sweep
and you get a Life Orb, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses Final Gambit, send in the second Metagross then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep
If opponent uses High Jump Kick, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch again into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep
If opponent uses High Jump Kick, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch again into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend then sweep

If opponent switches out into Mandibuzz, switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed then sweep

If opponent got an Attack Boost from Meteor Mash before using Belly Drum, use Earthquake to kill, as it sends out Mamoswine. Switch into Excadrill then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed then sweep
